name: Bug Rush (Rodrigo Okamoto)
description:
This game is short and simple, and it served as a way for me to learn more about coding in C++ and the inner workings of a game engine. I made this game using only C++ and the multimedia library SFML. Although the resulting game turned out to be slightly underwhelming, I learned an incredible amount and had a blast doing so. 

Here's the smooth brained source code if you are so inclined: https://github.com/digocorbellini/2D-Game-Engine
